Detail: Waist Assembly

This drawing shows the waist assembly. Its main purpose is to look kind-of bad-ass. The functional aspects of this assembly are marginal at best.

Detail : Waist front panels

The front panel contains a hole which can be used as a viewport and access panel to the inside of the robot. It is largely decorative in nature.

Detail : Waist Acrylic

This drawing is of the acrylic panel which fits into the front panel and provides a way to see inside the internals of the robot. Its primary purpose is to be the ooh, look, a robot! aspect of the robot.

Detail : Waist Sides

This drawing is of the waist side-panels. It provides a kind-of futuristic side-panel vent which is typical in lots of science-fiction robots, but provides no useful purpose.
